title: ISic000449. I.Sicily inscription 000449
body:
Facsimile Images

[hic pos]ita ((·)) Aurelia
[quae vix]it annos
[---]III ((·)) bene ((⸙))
[requies]ce ((christogram))
5[in pace Se]rtoria

Apparatus criticus

Text of Agnello with suggestions of Ferrua; [in pa]ce Cri(isti), Agnello
LIne.5: (vacat) [Se]rtoria, Agnello; vel [in pace Ma]rtoria, Ferrua

translation

commentary

Lower fragment was published by Orsi in 1893; upper fragment by Carini in 1874; Mommsen only aware of upper fragment; Agnello united the fragments, and Ferrua amended the reading.

bibliography

  • Carini 1874 510 no.11 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002091
  • 10.7170 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • Orsi 1893 292 no. 59 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001715
  • Agnello 1956 55 no.8 fig.1e https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002208
  • Ferrua 1989 33 no.100 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001995
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
